#Generated by VisualGDB project wizard.
#Note: VisualGDB will automatically update this file when you add new sources to the project.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.7)
project(OpenCVCamereDemo)
set(LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES "")
add_executable(OpenCVCamereDemo OpenCVCamereDemo.cpp)

set(OpenCV_SOURCE_DIR "C:/SysGCC/Raspberry/arm-linux-gnueabihf/sysroot/usr/shared/opencv2/share/OpenCV")

find_package(OpenCV REQUIRED)

ocv_include_directories("${OpenCV_SOURCE_DIR}/include")
ocv_include_modules_recurse(${OPENCV_CPP_SAMPLES_REQUIRED_DEPS})
target_link_libraries(OpenCVCamereDemo -L${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/../../raspicam-0.1.3/build/Debug/src ${OpenCV_LIBS} raspicam_cv raspicam "${LIBRARIES_FROM_REFERENCES}")
include_directories(../../raspicam-0.1.3/src)
